meanings.definition: A jellyfish or similar gelatinous marine animal.
meanings.sent1: The acalephe gracefully floated in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful acalephe while snorkeling in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The acalephe decided to have a dance party with the sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her flowing dress resembled the movements of an acalephe in the water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering acalephe illuminated the dark depths of the ocean.

meanings.definition: A stinging or poisonous marine organism.
meanings.sent1: Avoid touching the acalephe to prevent getting stung.
meanings.sent2: The acalephe's venomous tentacles can cause pain.
meanings.sent3: The acalephe challenged the sea urchin to a duel.
meanings.sent4: His sharp words stung like an acalephe's tentacles.
meanings.sent5: The acalephe's sting left a burning sensation on my skin.
